Damage Swap.Head: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack),
Damage Swap.Description: you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your Pokemon to another as long as you don't Knock Out that Pokemon.
Damage Swap.Tail: This power can't be used if Alakazam is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

Rain Dance.Head: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack),
Rain Dance.Description: you may attach 1 BLUE Energy card to 1 of your BLUE Pokemon. (This doesn't use up your 1 Energy card attachment for the turn.)
Rain Dance.Tail: This power can't be used if Blastoise is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

Energy Burn.Head: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack),
Energy Burn.Description: you may turn all Energy attached to Charizard into RED Energy for the rest of the turn.
Energy Burn.Tail: This power can't be used if Charizard is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.
